mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_user_role WHERE uid = #{id} and role_id=#{roleId}
mapper.select: SELECT ui.*, sr.id role_id, sr.name role_name FROM user_info ui left outer join sys_user_role sur on (ui.id = sur.uid ) left outer join sys_role sr on (sur.role_id = sr.id) left outer join sys_role_permission srp on (sr.id = srp.role_id) left outer join sys_permission sp on (srp.permission_id = sp.id) where ui.id = #{id}

SELECT ui.*, sr.id role_id, sr.name role_name, sp.id permission_id, sp.name permission_name FROM user_info ui left outer join sys_user_role sur on (ui.id = sur.uid ) left outer join sys_role sr on (sur.role_id = sr.id) left outer join sys_role_permission srp on (sr.id = srp.role_id) left outer join sys_permission sp on (srp.permission_id = sp.id) where ui.username = #{username}
